https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qiW7TQq4mmLygfFsp7QyEaNXxMH.jpg Amber belongs to a queer generation which no longer wants society to dictate their identity. The teenagers proudly inhabit a spectrum of fluid identities and master their first loves and losses. Always Amber
